short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official website editor extension for Kerni

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the extension that users of Kerni can use to edit their websites once they are onboarded into Kerni's platform. For more information about getting onboarded visit https://kerni.app
